tourBios.exmtStatus: 6th Nationwide Tour Qualifier at the 2010 PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.intlVics: (4): 2007 SBS Samsung Benest Open [Kor]. 2008 SBS Emerson Pacific Tottori Prefect Open [Kor]. 2009 SBS Samsung Benest Open [Kor]. 2010 Meritz Solmor Open [Kor].
tourBios.carHigh: 2010: Thanks to opening rounds of 69-67, finished T36 at the PGA TOUR Qualifying Tournament...Won for the fourth time on the Korean Tour, rolling to a seven-stroke victory over Kyung-Nam Kang at the Meritz Somoro Open in Yeoju. Has primarily played on the Japan Golf Tour and the Korean Tour since 2006. Has four victories in Korea, with two of his victories coming at the SBS Samsung Benest Open (2007 and 2009)...Has two runner-up finishes on the Japan GolfTour. His first came in 2007, at the JCB Classic. He shot a final-round 66, but it wasn't enough as he fell by a stroke to Kondo Tomohiro. Two years later, at the Shizu Hills Tommy Cup, he made it into a three-man playoff before fallng to Chris Campbell. His last top 10 on the Japan Golf Tour came in 2009, when he T10 at the Nagashima Shigeo Invitational Sega Sammy Cup

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T13th in 2011 at the Price Cutter Charity Championship Presented by Dr Pepper.
